synopsis.text: Mitsuru Tsukiumi brings to life the enchanting melody, "The Circle of Butterflies," in an animated music video featuring the fictional band Morfonica from the BanG! Dream anime series. This captivating track is the result of a creative collaboration with Junichi Satou of fh√°na, who lends his talent to composing and arranging the piece. The music video beautifully complements the song, immersing viewers in a world of animation that perfectly encapsulates the essence of Morfonica's sound. Don't miss out on this mesmerizing audiovisual experience!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
